sentences.sContent: You made a lot of silly mistakes .
sentences.sCn: 你犯了许多愚蠢的错误。

sentences.sContent: I left my keys at home, which was a pretty silly thing to do .
sentences.sCn: 我干了件傻事，把钥匙落在家里了。

sentences.sContent: ‘Shall we go for a walk?’ ‘ Don’t be silly , it’s dark.’
sentences.sCn: “我们去散步吧？”“别犯傻了，天都黑了。”

trans.tranCn: 愚蠢的；不明事理的；没头脑的
trans.tranOther: not sensible, or showing bad judgment
used to tell someone that you think they are not behaving sensibly
